name: quite
description: Wether warnings are shown or not (only cli)

name: dest
description: dest path or file without extension (relative to source path or absolute)

name: hideDefault
description: Hide key for default language in filename (default: true)

name: pos
description: Position of the locale key in file name <append|prepend> (default: 'append')

name: copyFileAttributes
description: Whether to copy the original attributes from file tag (default: true)

name: extraFileAttrs
description: File attributes to add to file tag (e.g. "attr1=value1;attr2=value2"

name: header
description: Whether to insert an empty header (default: true)

name: useIdForSource
description: Whether to use id for source (default: false)

name: addSourceLang
description: Whether to add a 'source-language' attribute to file tag (default: false)

name: addTargetLang
description: Whether to add a 'target-language' attribute to file tag (default: false)

name: forceTarget
description: Whether to always add 'target' entry (default: false)
